title: Kiss Man Person
alsoKnownAs: Kiss between a man and a person
description: Represents a man kissing another person. This emoji can denote romantic affection, love, or a close personal bond. The 'person' emoji is gender-neutral, allowing for broader interpretation of the relationship.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the kiss: man, person emoji portrays a tender moment with a man puckering his lips towards a companion, their faces brought close with soft, rounded edges. The Apple design imbues the figures with a gentle blush and subtle highlights, emphasizing a feeling of affection and romance. This emoji on Apple devices is perfect for conveying warmth, love, or a sweet farewell in digital conversations.
